mapper.select: SELECT A.ORDER_NUMBER, A.MEMBER_ID, A.GOODS_NUMBER, A.ORDER_DATE, A.ORDER_PAY_STATE, A.ORDER_STATE,E.GOODS_NAME,A.ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE FROM ORDERLIST A, GOODS E WHERE E.GOODS_NUMBER = A.GOODS_NUMBER ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC, ORDER_NUMBER DESC

SELECT A.ORDER_NUMBER, A.MEMBER_ID, A.GOODS_NUMBER, A.ORDER_AMOUNT, A.ORDER_DATE, A.ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE, A.ORDER_PAY_STATE, A.ORDER_STATE, C.BUYER_NAME, C.BUYER_ZIPCODE, C.BUYER_ADDRESS1, C.BUYER_ADDRESS2, C.RECEIVER_NAME, C.BUYER_EMAIL, C.DELIVERY_MESSAGE, E.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, E.GOODS_NAME, E.GOODS_CATEGORY1, E.GOODS_CATEGORY2, E.GOODS_COLOR, E.GOODS_SIZE FROM ORDERLIST A, DELIVERY C, GOODS E WHERE A.ORDER_NUMBER= C.ORDER_NUMBER AND E.GOODS_NUMBER = A.GOODS_NUMBER AND C.ORDER_NUMBER = #{ORDER_NUMBER} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC, ORDER_NUMBER DESC

SELECT A.ORDER_NUMBER, A.GOODS_NUMBER, A.ORDER_AMOUNT, A.ORDER_DATE, A.ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE, A.ORDER_PAY_STATE, A.ORDER_STATE, C.BUYER_NAME, C.BUYER_ZIPCODE, C.BUYER_ADDRESS1, C.BUYER_ADDRESS2, C.RECEIVER_NAME, C.BUYER_EMAIL, C.DELIVERY_MESSAGE, A.MEMBER_ID, E.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, E.GOODS_NAME, E.GOODS_CATEGORY1, E.GOODS_CATEGORY2, E.GOODS_COLOR, E.GOODS_SIZE FROM ORDERLIST A, DELIVERY C, GOODS E WHERE A.ORDER_NUMBER= C.ORDER_NUMBER AND E.GOODS_NUMBER = A.GOODS_NUMBER AND A.ORDER_NUMBER LIKE '%'||#{isSearch}||'%' ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC, ORDER_NUMBER DESC

SELECT A.ORDER_NUMBER, A.GOODS_NUMBER, A.ORDER_AMOUNT, A.ORDER_DATE, A.ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE, A.ORDER_PAY_STATE, A.ORDER_STATE, C.BUYER_NAME, C.BUYER_ZIPCODE, C.BUYER_ADDRESS1, C.BUYER_ADDRESS2, C.RECEIVER_NAME, C.BUYER_EMAIL, C.DELIVERY_MESSAGE, A.MEMBER_ID, E.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, E.GOODS_NAME, E.GOODS_CATEGORY1, E.GOODS_CATEGORY2, E.GOODS_COLOR, E.GOODS_SIZE FROM ORDERLIST A, DELIVERY C, GOODS E WHERE A.ORDER_NUMBER= C.ORDER_NUMBER AND E.GOODS_NUMBER = A.GOODS_NUMBER AND A.ORDER_PAY_STATE = #{isSearch} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC, ORDER_NUMBER DESC

select goods_sellcount*goods_price as sales from goods
